metadata.description: Unique identifier for each wire transfer transaction.
Name of the bank from which the wire transfer originates.
Account number associated with the sender's bank account from which the wire transfer originates.
Name of the bank to which the wire transfer is sent.
Account number associated with the recipient's bank account to which the wire transfer is sent.
Country from which the wire transfer originates.
Country to which the wire transfer is sent.
The monetary value of the wire transfer transaction.

The reason for an individual being on the watchlist. It stores a string value that provides information about why the person is being monitored. This column is used to track potential risks or threats associated with each individual on the watchlist.
Describes the specific issue or concern related to a particular country. The values in this column are of string data type and provide information on the reason why a country is on the watchlist.
Describes the specific issue or concern related to a particular country. The values in this column are of string data type and provide information on the reason why a country is on the watchlist.

Account number associated with the recipient's bank account to which the wire transfer is sent.
Country from which the wire transfer originates.
Country to which the wire transfer is sent.
The monetary value of the wire transfer transaction.

The complete name of an individual on the watchlist. This column stores the first name and last name of each person and is of string data type. It provides a way to uniquely identify each person on the watchlist.

expression.expression: CASE WHEN (person_reason is null) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
CASE WHEN isnull(source_country_issue) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
CASE WHEN isnull(target_country_issue) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
CASE WHEN ((transaction_amount >= 5000) AND (transaction_amount < 10000)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
